name: TheDiceBox
0:
”Alexa, open the dice box”
”Alexa, ask the dice box who should take out the trash”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the dice box
des: This is perfect for tabletop roleplay games, and oughta get a few laughs out of the group. Forget your dice? No problem! Just 'open the dice box'
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
